import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Edit.css" import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Edit = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState({ name: "", email:"", speciality:"" }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ const {name, value} = e.target setData({...data, [name]:value}) } const submit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() console.log(data) axios.put(`http://localhost:9292/tms/${id}`,{ name: data.name, email: data.email, speciality: data.speciality }) .then((recv) => {console.log(recv)}) .then(err => console.log(err)) } return (
